posts.content:
Here we go then....


The Volksworld Show is held at Sandown Park Racecourse, Esher. KT10 9AJ

Website: https://volksworld.com/vw-show-sandown/

The Volskworld Show is nearly upon us yet again, which means another club displayâ€¦ So I am looking for buses to show in the line-up. If you'd like to participate at the shown for the whole weekend or just Saturday or just Sunday. Buses can be removed from the club line up each evening to camp in if you wish to do so. on arrival each day please congregate at 07:45 and park up in the main car park near the paddock entrance gate, located to the far right of the main entrance. It is important that you do not block this entrance!

Important!! If you own a highroof/hightop split please make the effort and get it to the show as we have a special location for you guys. To make an impact we are going to need all of you!!!

Outer line up: Again there will be the usual over-spill line up just to the left of the main entrance, again if you own a bus please park it here if you can't get in or are late coming.

Please feel free to forward this post on to any appropriate social media sites etc. and add youself to the list below to give me an idea on numbers


Cheers and see you there!!!

Rikki (07802 884 583)

I still need a load more buses people! Come on, your club needs your support! I have loads of space so can facilitate you and your bus on either or both days (and of course you will have the best parking spot in the show!). Plus you have access to your bus during the day and it can be removed each evening for you to camp in!
Please call me and Iâ€™ll get you on board or just add yourself to the list.

Thanks all.

Rikki. 07802 884583
